articles.title: Microsoft Ignite Shows AI Progress Has Slowed. The Focus Turns to Profits.
articles.content: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella announced new AI-focused features Tuesday but first he addressed concerns that AI’s exponential growth has started to slow.

articles.title: Qualcomm downgraded as Apple split and licensing woes loom
articles.content: Investing.com - President Capital Management downgraded Qualcomm Incorporated (NASDAQ:QCOM) stock, citing mounting challenges, including regulatory risks, Apple’s shift to self-developed 4G/5G modem chips, a slowdown in its licensing (QTL) business, and weakness in the AI PC segment.

articles.title: Apple Takes Over Apple News Ad Sales, Phases Out Third Parties
